Gathering Guests: Herne
'When you are ready, go to Herne in Cardolan and find someone to invite to visit us in Furtherholm.'
Residents bothered ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You have found potential visitors in Herne. You should choose one who is most likely to accept an invitation to visit Furtherholm for the Midsummer Festival and invite them.
TBD
'Don't be ridiculous. Be on your way.'
'What is wrong with you? Go away.\q
'Leave me alone, or I shall call a guard!'
'Whatever you are selling, I don't want it.'

You have been tasked with travelling to Herne in Cardolan and finding a potential visitor who might accept an invitation to visit Furtherholm for the Midsummer Festival. You should look around Herne for potential visitors.
Invite someone to visit Furtherholm
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not bother people ([placeholder]/[placeholder])</rgb>
TBD - Talk to TBD
'You know, I have always wanted to leave this place. Yes, I will do it!'
'Does such a place truly exist? I must see it for myself!'
'I will start packing my things this minute!'
Find potential visitors in Herne
Kh√¢taphos believes that there may be some among the residents of Herne who could use a tropical holiday.
'I've never heard of anything so foolish. Move off.'
'Abandon my people in this time of need? You insult me!'
Completed Gathering Guests: Herne
You see some potential visitors

'I have seen a map of the land that was once the old northern Kingdom of Cardolan. I spoke to a learned man who asked, \qWhat happened to the Men of Anor and Cardolan?\q, and I can tell you what I think - they are still there! Or rather, their descendants are. If they themselves were still there, that would be ghastly.

'Go to this village called Herne. It has a good location for trade, so I expect there will be a thriving community there. Find someone who might cheerfully accept an invitation to Furtherholm. Mind that you do not bother too many people who would not be open to such a journey, or people will think you a pest and grow to have a poor opinion of us.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
